media:group.media:description: ► Subscribe for more videos: http://bit.ly/1LpvTeF ► Watch more episodes: https://bit.ly/2H5cd0B The Beginner's Bible - Created to help you share the most important lessons from the greatest stories ever told, The Beginner’s Bible Series brings the true wonder and joy of the Bible to life. Featuring an original theme sung by Kathie Lee Gifford, memorable songs, vivid animation and heartwarming characters, this series is a delightful new way to introduce young children to the timeless stories of inspiration, courage and faith.
